      • show

        public void show()
        Show this SnackBar. Make sure it already attached to a parent view or this method will do nothing.

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss()
        Dismiss this SnackBar. It must be in STATE_SHOWN to be dismissed.

      • getState

        public int getState()
        Get the current state of this SnackBar.
        Returns:
        The current state of this SnackBar. Can be STATE_DISMISSED, STATE_DISMISSING, STATE_SHOWING or STATE_SHOWN.
